com.github.sanity4j.ant.taskdef

Class RunQA

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tools.ant.ProjectComponent
      • org.apache.tools.ant.Task
        • com.github.sanity4j.ant.taskdef.RunQA

  • public class RunQA
extends org.apache.tools.ant.Task
    This class is an Apache ANT task that runs Sanity4J against a project's source code and classes.

    This task simply configures up a QAProcessor and then runs it in the execute() method.

    Since:
    Sanity4J 1.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RunQA.Configuration
      An ant type that stores a tool name / tool version / and the 'location' of a configuration file for the given tool.

      • execute

        public void execute()
             throws org.apache.tools.ant.BuildException
        Executes this task, invoking the QAProcessor which has already been configured by Ant using the setters in this Task.
        Overrides:
        execute in class org.apache.tools.ant.Task
        Throws:
        org.apache.tools.ant.BuildException - if there is an error executing the task.
